title.en: Create or schedule a draft post

description.en: Create a draft post given some text content and schedule it for a later date.
description.de: Erstellen Sie einen Entwurf anhand von Textinhalt und planen Sie ihn für ein späteres Datum.

vars.API_KEY: env:TYPEFULLY_API_KEY|Get your API key in the Dashboard of Typefully.com

inputs.name: Content

description.en: The text content for the draft.

inputs.bot: You can split into multiple tweets by adding 4 consecutive newlines between tweets.

inputs.name: Threadify
inputs.bot: If true, content will be automatically split into multiple tweets.

inputs.name: Share
inputs.bot: If true, returned payload will include a share_url.

inputs.name: Schedule Date
inputs.bot: Can either be an ISO formatted date (e.g.: 2022-06-13T11:13:31.662Z) or 'next-free-slot'.

inputs.name: Auto Retweet Enabled
inputs.bot: If true, the post will have an AutoRT enabled, according to the one set on Typefully for the account.

inputs.name: Auto Plug Enabled
inputs.bot: If true, the post will have an AutoPlug enabled, according to the one set on Typefully for the account.
